Sentencas: In this paper, 2D models for direct carbon solid oxide fuel cells (DC-SOFCs) with in situ catalytic steam-carbon gasification reaction are developed.
Titulo: Experimental and modeling study of high performance direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell with in situ catalytic steam-carbon gasification reaction

Sentencas: The simulation results are found to be in good agreement with experimental data.
Titulo: Experimental and modeling study of high performance direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell with in situ catalytic steam-carbon gasification reaction

Sentencas: The performance of DC-SOFCs with and without catalyst are compared at different operating potential, anode inlet gas flow rate and operating temperature.
Titulo: Experimental and modeling study of high performance direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell with in situ catalytic steam-carbon gasification reaction

Sentencas: It is found that adding suitable catalyst can significantly speed up the in situ steam-carbon gasification reaction and improve the performance of DC-SOFC with H2O as gasification agent.
Titulo: Experimental and modeling study of high performance direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell with in situ catalytic steam-carbon gasification reaction

Sentencas: The potential of syngas and electricity co-generation from the fuel cell is also evaluated, where the composition of H-2 and CO in syngas can be adjusted by controlling the anode inlet gas flow rate.
Titulo: Experimental and modeling study of high performance direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell with in situ catalytic steam-carbon gasification reaction

Sentencas: In addition, the performance DC-SOFCs and the percentage of fuel in the outlet gas are both increased with increasing operating temperature.
Titulo: Experimental and modeling study of high performance direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell with in situ catalytic steam-carbon gasification reaction

Sentencas: At a reduced temperature (below 800 degrees C), good performance of DC-SOFC can still be obtained with in-situ catalytic carbon gasification by steam.
Titulo: Experimental and modeling study of high performance direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell with in situ catalytic steam-carbon gasification reaction

Sentencas: The results of this study form a solid foundation to understand the important effect of catalyst and related operating conditions on H2O-assisted DC-SOFCs.
Titulo: Experimental and modeling study of high performance direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell with in situ catalytic steam-carbon gasification reaction
